name: @fazor/fazor
description: a redux like state engine using react useReducer and constate

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npx babel src -d dist && cp package.json dist
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish-major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && git push

author: Tyson Hester
